talk.author: did:plc:w4gwaxn2yb5ptbxxiadj36aw
talk.utter: Drove a company 2003 Mazda B series (Ranger equivalent) for years.  I still pass it on the local roads still doing yeoman service for the same company. All that’s needed for 75% of their hauling.

talk.author: did:plc:jnwccutzukvshuw3v25f7abh
talk.utter: Where did we go awry with pickups? They’ve become a caricature.

talk.author: did:plc:w4gwaxn2yb5ptbxxiadj36aw
talk.utter: A number of seemingly unrelated factors brought Big Truck to the forefront.  One: I remember moving to the Okanagan, wanting out of my mini van, and wondering if one of those giant ex-forestry stretch cabs would be the way to go.  This was before I was enlightenized. Found out that they were…
